message.content:
cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.CC

Reasoning: The paper deals with the construction and analysis of linear cyclic codes with the locality property or locally recoverable codes (LRC codes). This is a topic in information theory (cs.IT) and cryptography (cs.CR). The paper also discusses the use of subfield subcodes of cyclic LRC codes, which is related to the study of data structures (cs.DS) and algorithms (cs.CC). Additionally, the paper mentions the use of upper bounds on the dual distance of cyclic codes, which is a topic in coding theory and information theory (cs.SI).
